anya-e0802n1:13: Sabbavacanānamattho akkhareheva saññāyate. Akkharavipattiyaṁ hi atthassa dunnayathā hoti, tasmā akkharakosallaṁ bahūpakāraṁ suttantesu.
anya-e0802n1:15: Te ca kho akkharā api akārādayo ekacattā līsa suttantesu sopakārā.
anya-e0802n1:16: Taṁ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ, iti akkharā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:19: Tattha akkharesu akārādīsu odantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:20: Taṁ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, iti sarā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:23: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:24: Taṁ yathā? A i u, iti rassā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:27: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:28: Taṁ yathā? Ā ī ū e o, iti dīghā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:31: Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā akkharā kakārādayo niggahitantā byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:32: Taṁ yathā? Ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ, iti byañjanā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:35: Tesaṁ kho byañjanānaṁ kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0802n1:36: Taṁ yathā? Ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, iti vaggā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:42: Yā ca pana paresu sakkataganthesu samaññā ghosāti vā aghosāti vā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.
anya-e0802n1:43: Tattha ghosā nāma-ga gha ṅa, ja jha ña, ḍa ḍha ṇa, da dha na, ba bha ma, ya ra la va ha ḷa, iti ghosā nāma. Aghosā nāma-ka kha, ca cha, ṭa ṭha, ta tha, pa pha, sa, iti aghosā nāma.
anya-e0802n1:46: Tattha sandhiṁ kattukāmo pubbabyañjanaṁ adhoṭhitaṁ assaraṁ katvā sarañca upari katvā sarena viyojaye.
anya-e0802n1:49: Assaraṁ kho byañjanaṁ adhoṭhataṁ parakkharaṁ naye yutte. Tatrābhiratimiccheyya.
anya-e0802n1:50: Yuttetikasmā? Akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me. Ettha pana yuttaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0802n1:54: Sarā kho sare pare lopaṁ papponti.
anya-e0802n1:55: Yassindriyāni samathaṅgatāni. No hetaṁ bhante sametāyasmā saṅghena.
anya-e0802n1:57: Saramhā asarūpā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:58: Cattāro’me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnu’ māvasamaṇiyo. Vāti kasmā? Pañcindriyāni, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
anya-e0802n1:60: Saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:62: Kvacīti kasmā? Yassindriyāni, tathūpamaṁ dhammavaraṁ adesayi.
anya-e0802n1:64: Saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci dīghaṁ pappoti. Saddhīdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, anāgārehi cūbhayaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:65: Kvacīti kasmā? Pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgato. Natthaññaṁ kiñci.
anya-e0802n1:67: Pubbo ca saro parasaralope kate kvaci dīghaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:68: Kiṁsūdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā, kvacīti kasmā? Itissa muhuttampi.
anya-e0802n1:70: Ekārassa antabhūtassa sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:71: Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo, tyāhaṁ evaṁ vadeyyaṁ, tyāssa pahīnā honti.
anya-e0802n1:74: Okārukārānaṁ antabhūtānaṁ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:75: Atha khvassa, svassa hoti, bahvābādho, vatthvettha vihitaṁ niccaṁ cakkhāpāthamāgacchati.
anya-e0802n1:76: Kvacītikasmā? Cattāro’me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnumāva samaṇiyo.
anya-e0802n1:78: Sabbo icceso tisaddo byañjano sare pare kvaci cakāraṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:79: Iccetaṁ kusalaṁ, iccassa vacanīyaṁ, paccuttaritvā, paccāharati.
anya-e0802n1:82: Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:85: Vaggahaṇena dhakārassa hakārādeso hoti sāhu dassana mariyānaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:100: Kho kassa, yathā? Nikkhamati. Iccevamādī yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n1:102: Pubbo ivaṇṇo sare pare yakāraṁ pappoti navā. Paṭisunthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhūyate.
anya-e0802n1:103: Navāti kasmā? Pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato, muttacāgī anuddhato.
anya-e0802n1:105: Saramhā parassa evassa ekārassa ādissa rikāro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā.
anya-e0802n1:106: Yathariva vasudhātalañca sabbaṁ, tathariva guṇavā supūjaniyo.
anya-e0802n1:107: Navāti kasmā? Yathā eva, tathā eva.
anya-e0802n1:111: Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpāni honti.
anya-e0802n1:112: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, pamādo maccuno padaṁ, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato ahu.
anya-e0802n1:114: Sarā kho sare pare kvaci pakatirūpāni honti.
anya-e0802n1:118: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṁ papponti.
anya-e0802n1:119: Sammā dhammaṁ vipassato, evaṁ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṁ tapo titikkhā.
anya-e0802n1:120: Kvacīti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati, patilīyati, paṭihaññati.
anya-e0802n1:122: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṁ papponti.
anya-e0802n1:123: Bhovādināma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.
anya-e0802n1:124: Kvacīti kasmā? Sammāsamādhi, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṁ, upanīyati jīvitamappamāyu.
anya-e0802n1:126: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṁ papponti. Tatra ca lope kate akārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n1:127: Sa sīlavā. Sa paññavā esa dhammo sanantano, sa ve kasāvamarahati, sa mānakāmopi bhaveyya, sa ve muni jātibhayaṁ adassi.
anya-e0802n1:128: Kvacīti kasmā? So muni, eso dhammo padissati, na so kāsāvamarahati.
anya-e0802n1:130: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne.
anya-e0802n1:131: Idhappamādo, purisassa jantuno, pabbajjaṁ kittayissāmi, cātuddasi, pañcaddasi, abhikkantataro cando.
anya-e0802n1:132: Ṭhāneti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati.
anya-e0802n1:134: Vagge kho pubbesaṁ byañjanānaṁ ghosāghosabhūtānaṁ saramhā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ tatiyapaṭhamakkharā dvebhāvaṁ gacchanti ṭhāne.
anya-e0802n1:135: Eseva cajjhānapphalo, yatraṭṭhitaṁ nappasaheyya maccu, sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, cattāriṭṭhānāni naro pamatto.
anya-e0802n1:136: Ṭhāneti kasmā? Idha cetaso daḷhaṁ gaṇhāti thāmasā.
anya-e0802n1:140: Niggahitaṁ kho byañjane pare aṁ iti hoti.
anya-e0802n1:143: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahitaṁ kho vaggantaṁ vā pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:144: Tanniccutaṁ, dhammañcare sucaritaṁ, cirappavāsiṁ purisaṁ. Santantassa manaṁ hoti, taṅkāruṇikaṁ, evaṅkho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:146: Vāti kasmā? Na taṁ kammaṁ kataṁ sādhu.
anya-e0802n1:148: Ekārahakāre pare niggahitaṁ kho ñakāraṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:149: Paccattaññeva parinibbāyissāmi, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṁ. Tañhi tassa musā hoti.
anya-e0802n1:150: Vāti kasmā? Evametaṁ abhiññāya, evaṁ hoti subhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:152: Niggahitaṁ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:156: Niggahitassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n1:158: Vāti kasmā? Akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me.
anya-e0802n1:159: 35, 34.Ya va ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
anya-e0802n1:160: Sare pare yakāro vakāro makāro dakāro nakāro takāro rakāro lakāro ime āgamā honti vā.
anya-e0802n1:161: Nayimassa vijjā, yathayidaṁ cittaṁ. Migī bhantā vudikkhati, sittā te lahu messati, asittā te garu messati. Asso bhadro kasāmiva, sammadaññā vimuttānaṁ. Manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ, attadatthamabhiññāya. Ciraṁnāyati, ito nāyati. Yasmātiha bhikkhave, tasmātiha bhikkhave, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ. Sabbhireva samāsetha, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āraggā. Chaḷabhiññā, saḷāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:162: Vāti kasmā? Evaṁ mahiddhiyā esā, akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me, ajeyyo anugāmiko.
anya-e0802n1:163: Caggahaṇena idheva makārassa pakāro hoti. Cirappavāsiṁ purisaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:164: Kakārassa ca dakāro hoti. Sadatthapasuto siyā.
anya-e0802n1:168: Atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya carituṁ. Parosahassaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:169: Kvacīki kasmā? Etha passathimaṁ lokaṁ, andhībhūto ayaṁ loko.
anya-e0802n1:171: Niggahitañcāgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci.
anya-e0802n1:172: Cakkhuṁudapādi, avaṁsiro, yāvañcidha bhikkhave purimaṁ jātiṁ sarāmi, aṇuṁthūlāni sabbaso, manopubbaṅgamā dhammā.
anya-e0802n1:173: Kvacīti kasmā? Idheva naṁ pasaṁsanti, pecca sagge pamodati, na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṁ disaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:174: Caggahaṇena visaddassa ca pakāro hoti. Pacessati, vicessati vā.
anya-e0802n1:176: Niggahitaṁ kho sare pare kvaci lopaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:178: Kvacīti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo etamatthaṁ viditvāna.
anya-e0802n1:180: Niggahitaṁ kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0802n1:182: Kvacīti kasmā? Etaṁ maṅgalamuttamaṁ, taṁ vo vadāmi bhaddante.
anya-e0802n1:184: Niggahitamhā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0802n1:186: Vāti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo, etadahosi.
anya-e0802n1:188: Niggahitamhā parasmiṁ sare lutte yadi byañjano sasaññogo visaññogo hoti.
anya-e0802n1:191: Caggahaṇena tiṇṇaṁ byañjanānamantare ye sarūpā, tesampi lopo hoti. Agyāgāraṁ, paṭisanthāravutyassa.
anya-e0802n1:195: Puthaiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n1:198: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti, anto ca saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:202: Abhiiccetassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti. Abbhudīritaṁ, abbhuggacchati.
anya-e0802n1:207: Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoitivuttarūpā naṁ honti vā.
anya-e0802n1:211: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare ‘‘sabbo caṁ tī’’ti vuttarūpaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0802n1:215: Patiiccetassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n1:217: Kvacīti kasmā? Paccantimesu janapadesu, patilīyati, patirūpadesavāso ca.
anya-e0802n1:219: Puthaiccetassa anto saro byañjane pare ukāro hoti.
anya-e0802n1:221: Antaggahaṇena aputhassāpi sare pare antassa ukāro hoti, manuññaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:223: Avaiccetassa byañjane pare kvaci okāro hoti.
anya-e0802n1:225: Kvacīti kasmā? Avasussatu me sarīre maṁsalohitaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:227: Anupadiṭṭhānaṁ upasagganipātānaṁ sarasandhīhi byañjanasandhīhi vuttasandhīhi ca yathāyogaṁ yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0802n1:228: Pāpanaṁ , parāyaṇaṁ, upāyanaṁ, upāhanaṁ, nyāyogo, nigupadhi, anubodho, duvūpasantaṁ, suvūpasantaṁ, dvālayo, svālayo, durākhyātaṁ, svākhyāto, udīritaṁ, samuddiṭṭhaṁ, viyaggaṁ, vijjhaggaṁ, byaggaṁ, avayāgamanaṁ, anveti, anupaghāto, anacchariyaṁ, pariyesanā, parāmāso, evaṁ sare ca honti.
anya-e0802n1:229: Pariggaho, paggaho, pakkamo, parakkamo, nikkamo, nikkasāvo, nillayanaṁ, dullayanaṁ, dumbhikkhaṁ, dubbuttaṁ, sandiṭṭhaṁ, duggaho, viggaho, niggato, abhikkamo, paṭikkamo, evaṁ byañjane ca. Sesā sabbe yojetabbā.
